es.page.elfItemRockCamera.describe.en_US: Seek Dust can resonate with around but is slow and only can get info about environment around. Rock Camera made in Elf Craft can fast get info about not only environment around but also target bock with costing Dust. That is best choice for exploring.

es.page.monsterArrogantSheep.describe.zh_CN:
使用黄色羊毛作为信物，再加上大量的灵魂可以召唤出傲慢绵羊的迷宫（远离召唤点巨大的迷宫便会开始建造）。
迷宫的由几乎无法被破坏的特殊金砖构成，一共分为两层，傲慢的绵羊便位于第二层。
要战胜它，剪刀和绯红水晶是不可缺少的东西。
从它身上获取到的傲慢的羊毛是一种十分贵重的材料，不仅如此，将它放到「元素平台」上会产生金锭，不过每产生一个金锭羊毛都有可能会消失。
es.page.monsterArrogantSheep.describe.en_US:
Use Yellow Wool as Keepsake can summon Arrogant Maze(Away from the summon point, the maze will begin to be built).
The maze is composed of special gold bricks that can hardly be destroyed, It is divided into two layers, Arrogant Sheep is on the second floor.
To defeat it, scissor and Scarlet Crystal is necessary.
The Arrogant Wool obtained from it is a very valuable material, and put it on Element Platform can produce Gold Ingot, however, every time a Gold Ingot is produced, the wool may disappear.

es.page.monsterDejectedSkeleton.describe.zh_CN:
不知何时，骷髅开始变得忧郁了。
忧郁骷髅和普通骷髅样子以及攻击方式几乎一致，不过它们拥有更多的生命，并且可以在阳光下行走。
在攻击或者被攻击时，会发出犹豫的光芒，不同颜色的光会产生不同的效果。
使用未送达之信作为信物可以召唤出法阵，并会将周围的骷髅变得忧郁，击败它们有几率掉落忧郁之泪。
es.page.monsterDejectedSkeleton.describe.en_US:
Skeleton began to feel blue.
No matter looks or attack mode, Dejected Skeleton is as same sa normal Skeleton, but they have more hp and can walk in the sun.
When attacking or being attacked, it will emit dejected light. Different colors of the light will has different effect.
Use Undelivered Letter get in Quest as Keepsake can summon the Circle to change normal Skeleton be Dejected, Dejected Tear will drop with probability when defeat them.

es.page.monsterDejectedSkeleton1.describ.zh_CN:
忧郁光芒的作用：
红色：只接受普通剑击，反之获得回血并获得buff
蓝色：只接受魔法攻击，反之反弹伤害
绿色：只接受远程物理攻击，反之给予debuff
黄色：只接受火焰或爆炸伤害，反之发生爆炸和着火
淡灰色：将攻击随机反弹到周围单位身上包括自身
紫色：无敌，回血并反弹任何伤害。
es.page.monsterDejectedSkeleton1.describ.en_US:
Dejected Light:
Red: gain regenerate buff if not sword attack.
Blue: return damage if not Magic Attack
Greem: give debuff if not remote physical attack.
Yellow: explosion and fire if not fire or explosion damage.
Light Grey: randomly bounce damage to surrounding units, including self
Purple: invincible, Borrowed and Retaliate.
es.page.monsterDejectedSkeleton1.describ.ja_JP:
忧郁光芒的作用：
红色：只接受普通剑击，反之获得回血并获得buff
蓝色：只接受魔法攻击，反之反弹伤害
绿色：只接受远程物理攻击，反之给予debuff
黄色：只接受火焰或爆炸伤害，反之发生爆炸和着火
淡灰色：将攻击随机反弹到周围单位身上包括自身
紫色：无敌，回血并反弹任何伤害。

es.page.monsterDreadCube.describe.zh_CN:
来自异界的漆黑立方体生物，漂浮在半空中，吞噬着周围所有的方块，失去活性的方块会变成无用的沙砾，同时会吐出多余的灵魂碎片。
好在它不会主动发起攻击，这可能会让你想到，用它来自动生产灵魂碎片。
当受到玩家攻击后会召唤怪物并进入休眠状态。如果召唤怪物成功，将会消耗自身的生命。生命越少召唤的怪物越多越强。
通过任务得到的恐惧碎片作为信物可以召唤它，击败它们有几率掉落恐惧宝石和立方体核心。
es.page.monsterDreadCube.describe.en_US:
Dark creature, float in mid air, devour all block around that let become useless grave and spit superfluous Soul Fragment.
It's good thing that it can not attack, that may make you think use it to automatically produce Soul Fragments.
When it attacked by the Steve, it will try summon monsters and into sleep. If summon success, it's hp will be consumed. The less HP, the more stronger monsters summoned.
Use Dread Fragment get in Quest as Keepsake can summon the Dread Cube, Dread Gem and Cube Core will drop with probability when defeat them.

es.page.monsterRabidRabbit.describe.zh_CN: 全身雪白但略微发红，眼睛尤为发红。它们会疯狂的攻击周围的生物，并从中获取能量迅速的繁殖。\n狂暴兔但只并不足畏惧，一旦他们成群的发送攻击，可不是什么好受的事情。\n通过兔皮或者兔脚作为信物可以召唤狂暴兔，击败它们有几率掉落狂暴皮革。
es.page.monsterRabidRabbit.describe.en_US: Slightly reddish white body, crimson eyes, they will frantically attack surrounding creatures, that get energy from to rapid reproduction.\nA single Rabid Rabbit is not to be feared but, once they attack in groups, now maybe run away is best choice for you.\nUse Rabbit Skin or Feet as Keepsake can summon the Rabid Rabbit, Rabid Leather will drop when defeat them.

es.page.relicGuardReport.describe.zh_CN: 遗迹守卫似乎是过去制造的一种兵器，目的未知，每次释放技能都会消耗HP，当HP低于一定程度会成为损坏态，核心会变得十分不稳定，并发生爆炸，此时可以同通过冲击权杖将核心取出来，其核心决定着遗迹守卫的元素类型，并且可以登陆核心主人。\n至此精灵工匠分析核心制作出了遗迹轮盘，可以修复损坏的损坏态的遗迹守卫，可以标定为核心标定核心主人(拿着核心和轮盘右键)。
es.page.relicGuardReport.describe.en_US: It seems that the Relic Guard is a weapon made in ancient. The purpose is unknown. Each time it spell a skill, HP will be consumed. When HP is lower than a certain level, it will become damaged, and the core will become very unstable and explode. At this time, the core can be taken out through the Shock Wand. The Core determines the element type of the Relic Guard and creature can login as master in The Core.\nSo, the Elf craftsman has analyzed the core and made the Relic Wheel, which can repair the damaged Relic Guard, and can login in The Core ( hold core and wheel, right click).

es.page.relicGuardReport1.describe.zh_CN: 核心似乎可以与召唤仪式发生共鸣，而产出未知的物品，有待进一步研究。
es.page.relicGuardReport1.describe.en_US: The core seems to resonate with The Summon Rite and produce unknown items, which requires further research.

es.page.relicZombie.describe.zh_CN:
使用遗迹碎片作为信物，可以召唤出遗迹僵尸，若能用在其身旁击败他，则可获得遗迹宝石。
遗迹僵尸共有三种类型，红色的战士、蓝色的法师、绿色的牧师，他们会使用不同的技能。
战士随着生命减少，会更换武器，并且增加速度等效果
法师无视远程伤害，会释放火球，落雷和召唤小僵尸
牧师会给敌人增加负面效果，给友方增加正面效果，生命减少时。
es.page.relicZombie.describe.en_US:
Use Relic fragment as Keepsake can summon the Relic Zombie. If steve can defeat it near it, Relic Gem will drop.
Relic Zombie has three types: red is warrior, blue is wizard, green is minister, They can use different skills.
Warrior: the less hp, the stronger.
Wizard: not afraid of long-range damage, and can cast fireballs, thunder and summon child zombies.
Minister: negative effect to the enemy, positive effect to the friendly.

es.page.startup.describe.zh_CN: 古代的知识可以帮助你开始你的魔法之旅，不过你先要去地下寻找一些“封藏石”，古代用来保存东西的一种石头，打碎后，可以掉出一些东西来。其中有一些古代的文献，似乎有着一些的价值，但是这并不是目前的主要任务，主要任务是从中找到能获取古代知识的道具。\n(作者：感谢您游玩这个mod)
es.page.startup.describe.en_US: Ancient knowledge can help you start your magical journey, but first you need to search underground for some 'Seal Stone', a stone used to preserve items in ancient. Breaking it, some items will drop. There are some ancient documents, which seem to have some value, but this is not the first task at present. The first task is to find the props needed to access ancient knowledge from them.\n(Author: Thank you for playing)
es.page.startup.describe.ja_JP: 古代の知識はあなたの魔法の旅を始めるのに役立ちますが、まず地下に行って「封蔵石」を探してみてください。古代に物を保存するために使われていた石の一種で、割ったら、何かを落とすことができます。その中にはいくつかの古代の文献があり、いくつかの価値があるようだが、これは現在の主要な任務ではなく、その中から古代の知識を得るための道具を見つけることが主要な任務である。\n（作者：このmodを遊んでくれてありがとうございます）

es.page.blessingJade.ct.zh_CN:
不同的碎片获取的方式不尽相同，这里有一些线索：
1:封藏石
2:噬魂
3:商人
4:钓鱼
5:熔炼
6:研究
7:烧制
8:委托
es.page.blessingJade.ct.en_US:
The methods to obtain different fragments vary. Here are some clues:
1: Seal Stone
2: Soul Killer
3: Merchant
4: Fishing
5: Smelting
6: Research
7: Smelting
8: Quest
